# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, substring, current_timestamp, coalesce, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_path1 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug_vw'
source_path2 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrugV2_vw'
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug'

# define variables
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
container_name = "nervecentre-data"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_relative_alcohol_path1 = "/ECDS_AlcoholDrug_vw.csv"
source_relative_alcohol_path2 = "/ECDS_AlcoholDrugV2_vw.csv"
target_relative_alcohol_path = "/ECDS_AlcoholDrug.csv"
source_alcohol_path1 = f'abfss://{container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net{source_relative_alcohol_path1}'
source_alcohol_path2 = f'abfss://{container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net{source_relative_alcohol_path2}'
target_alcohol_path1 = f'abfss://{container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net{target_relative_alcohol_path}'

source_delta_alcohol_path1 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug_vw'
source_delta_alcohol_path2 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrugV2_vw'
target_delta_alcohol_path1 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug'

# Step 1: Read the source CSV file
source_csv_df1 = spark.read.format("csv") \
              .option("header", "true") \
              .option("inferSchema", "true") \
              .load(source_alcohol_path1)


source_csv_df2 = spark.read.format("csv") \
              .option("header", "true") \
              .option("inferSchema", "true") \
              .load(source_alcohol_path2)

target_csv_df1 = spark.read.format("csv") \
              .option("header", "true") \
              .option("inferSchema", "true") \
              .load(target_alcohol_path1)


# # Write the read CSV to Delta tables
# source_csv_df1.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(source_delta_alcohol_path1)
# source_csv_df2.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(source_delta_alcohol_path2)
# target_csv_df1.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_delta_alcohol_path1)

# Write the read CSV to Delta tables
source_csv_df1.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(source_delta_alcohol_path1)
source_csv_df2.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(source_delta_alcohol_path2)
target_csv_df1.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_delta_alcohol_path1)

df1 = df1.select(
        col("visitarchiveid"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcohol"), 1, 50).alias("DrugAlcohol"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcoholSNOMED"), 1, 18).alias("DrugAlcoholSNOMED")
    )

# display(df1)

# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, substring, current_timestamp, coalesce, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_path1 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug_vw'
source_path2 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrugV2_vw'
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug'

# Read source views
df1 = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path1)
df2 = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path2)

# Create CTE equivalent
cte_df = (
    df1.select(
        col("visitarchiveid"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcohol"), 1, 50).alias("DrugAlcohol"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcoholSNOMED"), 1, 18).alias("DrugAlcoholSNOMED")
    )
    .union(
        df2.select(
            col("visitarchiveid"),
            substring(col("AlcoholDrugDesc"), 1, 50).alias("DrugAlcohol"),
            substring(col("EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug"), 1, 18).alias("DrugAlcoholSNOMED")
        )
    )
)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)

# Define merge and update conditions
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug = src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED
"""

update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.DrugAlcohol, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.AlcoholDrugDesc, 'X'))
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    cte_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug": "src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED",
        "AlcoholDrugDesc": "src.DrugAlcohol",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug": "src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED",
        "AlcoholDrugDesc": "src.DrugAlcohol",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, substring, current_timestamp, coalesce, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_path1 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug_vw'
source_path2 = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrugV2_vw'
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_AlcoholDrug'

# Read source views
df1 = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path1)
df2 = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path2)

# Create CTE equivalent
cte_df = (
    df1.select(
        col("visitarchiveid"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcohol"), 1, 50).alias("DrugAlcohol"),
        substring(col("DrugAlcoholSNOMED"), 1, 18).alias("DrugAlcoholSNOMED")
    )
    .union(
        df2.select(
            col("visitarchiveid"),
            substring(col("AlcoholDrugDesc"), 1, 50).alias("DrugAlcohol"),
            substring(col("EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug"), 1, 18).alias("DrugAlcoholSNOMED")
        )
    )
)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)

# Define merge and update conditions
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug = src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED
"""

update_condition = """
    (COALESCE(src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug, 'X')) OR
    (COALESCE(src.DrugAlcohol, 'X') <> COALESCE(tgt.AlcoholDrugDesc, 'X'))
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    cte_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug": "src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED",
        "AlcoholDrugDesc": "src.DrugAlcohol",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug": "src.DrugAlcoholSNOMED",
        "AlcoholDrugDesc": "src.DrugAlcohol",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")
